p07_get_days¶

Phenotyping.p07_get_days(df, start_day_col, end_day_col, result_col, e_id='merged_enc_id')¶

This function is to generate all dates between start_day_col and end_day_col of input dataframe, and store generated dates in result_col

Parameters

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – input dataframe, must contains the following columns: * e_id * start_day_col * end_day_col

  • start_day_col (str) – start datetime column name

  • end_day_col (str) – end datetime column name

  • result_col (str) – result column name

  • e_id (str) – encounter id column name, default value = ‘merged_enc_id’

Returns

result dataframe, must contains the following columns: * e_id * result_col

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

p07_get_aki_stage
